dwc:recordedBy: W. A. Weber, R.A. Anderson & D.D. Awasthi
dwc:verbatimLocality: west base of Steamboat mountain, foothills of Front Range 2 miles N.W. of Lyons
dwc:habitat: on vertical faces of talus blocks
dwc:occurrenceRemarks: Rev. Period. Lav. I.R. Accad. Padova 262. 1851-52. — Lichen flavus Bell., Append. Fl. Pedemont. 55. 1792. — Acarospora chlorophana (Wg.) Mass., Ricerche 27. 1852. — A. oxylona (Ach.) Mass., ibid. p.28. - A. sulphurata Arn., Lich. Ausfl. 22: 63. 1886.—A. hilaris (Duf.) Hue, Morph, et Anat. 113. 1909. — A. texana Magn. in Mycologia 21: 250. 1929. — A. gobiensis Magn., Monogr. Acar. 98. 1929. — A. novomexicana Magn. in Medd. Goteb. Tradg. 5: 58. 1930. — A. incertula Magn., l.c. p. 61. — A erythrophora Magn., l.c. p. 60. — A. weldensis Magn. in Goteb. Kgl. Vet. Handl. F. 6, ser. B, Bd. 6, No. 17: 15. 1956.
